arg.name: path
arg.description: Path to the YAML config file to publish.

arg.name: topic
arg.description: Topic name to publish the config.

arg.name: delay_before_first_publish
arg.description: Delay in seconds before the first publish; 0 or less = best effort (publish as soon as possible).

arg.name: frequency
arg.description: Republish rate in Hz; use 0 for one-shot.
